name: Super Snowman Avalanche
description:
Super Snowman Avalanche is an endless runner like no other as you crash, bash and smash your way through an array of procedurally generated obstacles as well as an army of Grump Goblins! The better you do, the bigger you get and if you’re big enough, not even log cabins can stop you! 

(Watch out for ski posts though. Avoid them at all cost)  

Have a ball with a variety of different power-ups and work towards wiping out all Goblins off the face of the earth!

Collect snowflakes to grow in size, pick up axes to get a free hit, absorb stars to become invincible, roll over ice for a speed boost and run over goblins for a laugh!
